thread.title: Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid head to NYFW Fendi party | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid head to NYFW Fendi party | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.Com
title: Kendall Jenner and Bella Hadid head to NYFW Fendi party | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now All Eyez On Me: Kendall (pictured with Fendi CEO Pietro Beccari) wore the unusual skirt with a vintage 2Pac T-shirt which she tucked into the waistband Strips of black leather revealed her thighs on the side but the weave was tighter across her front to ensure she did not show off more than she bargained for. Longer non-uniform strips of leather then flowed out from the skirt helping the star make an even more dramatic entrance. Kendall wore the unusual skirt with a vintage 2Pac T-shirt which she tucked into the waistband. Added extras: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star accessorized the look with a pair of on-trend velvet mid-calf boys and a large black clutch New 'do who dis: Kendall wore her now shorter hair in a half up, half down 'do with a haphazard bun at the top The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star accessorized the look with a pair of on-trend velvet mid-calf boys and a large black clutch. Adding some bling to the ensemble, the 21-year-old wore giant hoop earrings and a single gold chain necklace. Kendall wore her now shorter hair in a half up, half down 'do with a haphazard bun at the top. Doing it her way: Kendall walked into the party arm-in-arm with Bella, who wore a very edgy look for the fashionable event Chop and change: The 20-year-old wore a pair of high waisted jeans which had been cut into long shorts and had a wallet chain fastened on them The star's eyebrows were exaggerated and she balanced their strength with a pale pink almost nude lip color. Kendall walked into the party arm-in-arm with Bella, who wore a very edgy look for the fashionable event. The 20-year-old wore a pair of high waisted jeans which had been cut into long shorts and had a wallet chain fastened on them. Dare to bare: Hailey meanwhile heated up the cool night in a daring black sequineed dress BYO: The model wandered along with Bella's bestie Jesse Stark and sipping from a red Solo cup like were headed to a frat party rather than one of fashion's hottest events The model wore the shorts over fishnet stocking and a black high necked bodysuit. Trying to keep warm, Bella added a back bomber with red embroidery. The catwalk star finished off the outfit with a pair of strappy black heels and carried a Chrome Hearts backpack. Get shorty: The asymmetrical hemline was so short that at its longest point it finished on the 20-year-old's upper thigh and at its shortest, finished where her leg joins her body Nothing but net:Under the frock Hailey wore a mesh high neck bodysuit which went all the way down to her fingers Bella wore her dark looks slicked back into a bun which helped to highlight her famous facial features. Hailey meanwhile heated up the cool night in a daring black dress with beaded embellishment. The asymmetrical hemline was so short that at its longest point it finished on the 20-year-old's upper thigh and at its shortest, finished where her leg joins her body. Part of the crew: Kylie (and Tyga) also got ready with the girls and posted some snaps of her outfit on Snapchat Dangerous curves ahead: The star wore a tight grey dress which showed off her tiny waist Made for strutting: The 19-year-old wore some fierce thigh high snakeskin boot The top of the frock was also very sexy, plunging down to her belly button. Under the frock Hailey wore a mesh high neck bodysuit which went all the way down to her fingers. Initially the star stepped out just in the dress but popped a tan coat over the top quite quickly. Doing it for the gram: Of course before the girls made it to the party, the girls posed up for a myriad of social media snaps Hailey - who trotted along in platform boots - followed Bella's lead and wore her hair slicked up in a bun too. The model wandered along with Bella's bestie Jesse Stark and sipping from a red Solo cup like were headed to a frat party rather than one of fashion's hottest events. Of course before the girls made it to the party, the girls posed up for a myriad of social media snaps. One and done: Kendall had worn the leather look all day but it was still party perfection Hailey shared a video of Bella kicking her long legs up and down but then deleted off her Instagram stories. Kylie also got ready with the girls and posted some snaps of her outfit on Snapchat. The star wore a tight grey dress which showed off her tiny waist and some firece thigh high boots. Lots on: While her sister and pals have lots of work on, Kylie has been enjoying some time attending shows and dinners with Tyga
